target: 17.18 By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, Geographical location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
indicator_name: 17.18.1 Proportion of sustainable development indicators produced at the national level with full disaggregation when relevant to the target, in accordance with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 469 KB)
comments_limitations: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
